name: MangaToshokan helper for MangaUpdates, publishers
description:
On MangaUpdates series page provide small icon near publisher name that is allowed or not on MangaToshokan.com

ver 1.0.2 --- 2011-03-30
+ added "Soleil", "Pika Edition" and "Tonkam" to not allowed (French mangas)
ver 1.0.1 --- 2011-02-07
+ added "Les Humanoïdes Associés" to not allowed (French mangas)
ver 1.0 --- 2011-02-06
+ Initial release
